exposurecontrol: Program AE; Aperture Priority; Shutter Priority; Manual
isosensitivity: Auto; ISO 80; ISO 100; ISO 125; ISO 160; ISO 200; ISO 250; ISO 320; ISO 400; ISO 500; ISO 640; ISO 800; ISO 1000; ISO 1250; ISO 1600; ISO 2000; ISO 2500; ISO 3200; ISO 4000; ISO 5000; ISO 6400
